import { VisuallyHidden } from '@looker/components'
import { Editor, excludedProps } from '@looker/storybook'
import { ArgsTable, Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs'
import storyBasic from '!!raw-loader!./Basic'

<Meta component={VisuallyHidden} title="Docs/VisuallyHidden" />

# VisuallyHidden

This component will hide the contents from the screen. The main use for this component is to provide accessible content to visual elements of a UI, for example adding a screen reader accessible label to an icon.

<Editor code={storyBasic} />

<ArgsTable of={VisuallyHidden} exclude={excludedProps} />
